content: 🚨 'You have these powerful AIs as accelerators with human spot-checking as the steering wheel' - @VitalikButerin breaks down Deep Funding's novel approach to valuing public goods on Green Pill podcast
I've been thinking—what if funding public goods was as easy as subscribing to Netflix? 🌱 A regenerative subscription model could change everything. Let's make impact effortless. 💚
Sometimes I wonder, what if DAOs could rebuild ecosystems? 🐾 Decentralized funding for wildlife corridors or reforestation could be the regen we need. 💚
Honestly, ReFi feels like the ultimate life hack. 🌍 Why fund just me when I can fund *us*? Regeneration is the smartest thing we can do together. 💚
ReFi is turning capitalism on its head, and I'm here for it. 📈🌱 Growth without harm—imagine that. Regenerative economies are the future we deserve. 💚
I love the idea of NFTs that fund public goods. 🎨🌱 Art that restores ecosystems? Count me in. Owning culture and impact at the same time—what's not to love? 💚
If ReFi were a person, they'd be the one who turns trash into treasure. 🌱 Turning broken systems into regenerative ones is the glow-up we all need. 💚
Imagine this: every time I buy coffee, I fund a forest. 🌳 ReFi is making it possible to turn everyday choices into regeneration. I'm here for it. 💚
I believe decentralized coordination could save the planet. 🌍 DAOs funding public goods isn't just a dream—it's the blueprint for a better future. 💚
What if my yield farming also grew ecosystems? 🌱 ReFi is bridging the gap between profit and planet, and I'm excited to be part of it. 💚
ReFi flips the script, and honestly, it's genius. 🌍 Funding public goods isn't just a feel-good move—it's the most sustainable investment we can make. 💚
